REUTERS.UNKNOWN: A f1164 reute r f BC-NORTH-CAROLINA-FEDERA 04-02 0041

TEXT.TITLE: NORTH CAROLINA FEDERAL <NCFS> RAISES PRIME RATE
TEXT.BODY: North Carolina Federal Savings and Loan Association said it has raised its prime rate to 7-3/4 pct from 7-1/2 pct, effective yesterday, following moves by major banks. Reuter
